snippet: The Republican-led Michigan Legislature cleared the way on Thursday for Gov. Rick Snyder to sign a replacement for an emergency manager law struck down by voters.
abstract: Republican-led Michigan Legislature clears way for Gov Rick Snyder to sign replacement for emergency manager law struck down by voters.
lead_paragraph: The Republican-led Michigan Legislature cleared the way on Thursday for Gov. Rick Snyder to sign a replacement for an emergency manager law struck down by voters.

headline.main: Michigan: Legislators Pass Law on Emergency Manager Powers
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Legislators Pass Law On Emergency Manager Powers
